meaningMnemonic: You <radical>loiter</radical> on the <radical>mountain</radical>, reading off the digits of <radical>pi</radical> on this <radical>winter</radical> morning. The cold mountain air is so <kanji>delicate</kanji>, and changes only in very <kanji>tiny</kanji> ways — just like pi when you add another digit to it.
readingMnemonic: Ah! Of course! The <kanji>delicate</kanji> bumble <reading>be</reading>e (び). Slightly out of place in winter, but this tiny creature is your idea of delicate. It lands on your finger, and you look at every tiny fiber of its being.
